long_description: The Point 65 Martini Kayak Stern Section combines with the Martini Bow Section to form a single kayak and combines with both the Martini Center Section and Bow Section to form a tandem kayak. Innovative system joins pieces together, creating a stable, rigid kayak that you'll love to paddle in light surf, calm rivers and flatwater. Assembly happens in a flash: just align the sections, feed a strap into a ratchet, and ratchet down straps on either side of the cockpit. The Martini stands up to rough treatment thanks to a UV-resistant, single-layer polyethylene hull. Molded cockpit in bow and stern features a comfortable padded seat, foot pedals and thighbraces. Foot pedals in bow and stern control rudder to assist with tracking in adverse conditions. 17 x 10 in. rear hatch stores bulky gear, and 7.9 x 7.9 in. bow hatch is the perfect place for small day-tripping items. Bungee cords offer additional storage, and "Fish-O-Meter" hash marks on hull measure your catch. The Point 65 Martini kayak Includes paddle keeper, recessed water bottle holder and and molded carrying handles at bow and stern.
short_description: The Point 65 Martini Kayak Stern Section combines with the Martini Bow Section to form a single kayak and combines with both the Martini Center Section and Bow Section to form a tandem kayak.
